siteMetadata.title: rantum.dev
siteMetadata.subtitle: digital dwelling of andrew maury. digital developer @ecomloop in burlingame, ca. san matean nantucketer on a rantum scoot.

frontmatter.title: Strive for ideal not precedent
frontmatter.description: Precedent typically falls short of the purported ideals. Strive to the original ideals, not for the precedent that's been set.

frontmatter.title: Generate energy intrinsically
frontmatter.description: Use intrinsic motivation to generate energy. Extrinsic motivators are limiting.

frontmatter.title: Be the person you want your kids to be
frontmatter.description: Be a better father by being a better role model. Demonstrate string virtues and values. Take time and be supportive.

frontmatter.title: Allow time to shape next steps
frontmatter.description: The right path can take time. Don't rush into a decision if the path isn't clear. Strive for better, not perfect. Consider that time changes your own perspective.

frontmatter.title: Accept faults and work towards better
frontmatter.description: There's never a point where you can check a box and be done. Move towards being better. Become more aware of faults in order to improve.

frontmatter.title: Being silent is being complicit
frontmatter.description: It's not enough to not do wrong. Be proactive in doing good.

frontmatter.title: Harness technology to increase effective efforts
frontmatter.description: Technology should be considered as a tool. Tools can make processes easier and change the entire process.
